member.name: T:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata
member.summary: The struct stores information about a query display field represented in resultset as a column in results table. Contains number of well-known properties like Alias, Sequence, Format, etc. Also contains set of custom attributes specified for a display field by user.

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.DataType
member.summary: .net type of values provided by display field

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.Sequence
member.summary: Position of display field in query's display field list

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.Like
member.summary: A like field reference in form table.field

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.ReadOnly
member.summary: True if the field is not indended to be modified by updatable query

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.Required
member.summary: True if the field is required to have a value

member.name: P:Ice.BO.DynamicQuery.ResultFieldMetadata.Attributes
member.summary: Dictionary of attributes added to display field by user

member.summary: This method verifies a query and returns true if it is valid. false otherwise.
member.param: The dataset represents the current query
List of error messages returned if the query analysis is not success
member.returns: the result of analysis. true if query is OK, otherwise - false

member.summary: This method returns a list of BAQs that have a specific like field Used by: Server\bo\EpiSearch\EpiSearch.p

member.summary: This method runs an updatable query and returns result dataset.
member.param: Number of records in a page. 0 means you don't want paging
Number of page to return. 1 should be set by default
Returns sign whether there are more records to return. Has sense if you specify non default values for previous two parameters
member.returns: Returns the result dataset

member.name: T:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants
member.summary: Various constants used by DynamicQuery in its work.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.GlobalConstantsQueryID
member.summary: Name of predefined system query which return BAQ constants

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ConstantsTableID
member.summary: Name of BAQ constants table as a BAQ constant is referenced in a query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ResultsDataSetName
member.summary: Name of dataset returned by query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ResultsTableName
member.summary: Name of table with result row set in the dataset returned by query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ErrorsTableName
member.summary: Name of table with possible query execution errors in the dataset returned by query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ExecutionInfoTableName
member.summary: Name of table with additional query execution information in the dataset returned by query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CalcFieldFakeTableName
member.summary: Name of fake table used by BAQ to work with calc field in the same way as with ordinal table field

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.HasPagesInfoName
member.summary: Flag which tells whether there are one more pages in addition to currently returned. Returned only for paged query only.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.TotalRows
member.summary: Total rows in query result set. This information is returned if NeedTotalSettingName is set in ExecutionInfo. May affect query performance.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ExecutionTime
member.summary: The total time in milliseconds spent for query execution and pumping results

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.TopNSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for TOP setting which limits number of rows returned by the query. This is applied after query settings, so if the query has predefined TOP N already then the smallest N wins.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.SelectSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for SELECT. This is comma-delimited list of fields in SQL notation. Here you can narrow set of fields returned by query. Only display fields can be referenced.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.WhereSettingName
member.summary: Setting name of additional conditions in SQL notation which are applied against results table. Only display fields and BAQ/SQL constants be referenced. You can use here statements of any complexity including and/or concatenations. If ExecutionFilter table contains any conditions then they will be applied before this where condition

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.HavingSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for statement appeared in HAVING clause in addition to query settings.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.OrderBySettingName
member.summary: Setting name for comma-delimited list of fields by which query result need to be sorted. Optional direction can be specified in SQL notation (ASC/DESC).

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.GroupBySettingName
member.summary: Setting name for comma-delimited list of fields by which query result need to be grouped.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.TimeoutSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for limitation of query execution time. This works only for queries against MS SQL server. Default value is 500 ms.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.TransIsolationSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for transaction isolation. Is mapped to corresponding SQL setting. Allowed values can be taken from DynamicQueryConstants.TransactionIsolation enumeration. The default isolation level is ReadUncommited for ordinal queries and for external queries which configured with MS SQL client or have Prophet21 application type.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CompanyFilterSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for additional filtering by company (companies). This setting is actual for cross-company queries only. This setting narrows list of companies selected during query execution. Rows with empty company field always get into result. To specify list of companies add row with Name=CompanyFilterSettingName and Value=company id for each company in list.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.PageNumSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for paging. Specifies a number of the page to return. Started with 1. Should be accompanied with PageSize setting

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.PageSizeSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for paging. Specifies a size of the page. If set to 0 that means the paging is turned off.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.PagingTypeSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for paging method. Currently accepted: Simple, Partition, Offset, Auto. Auto method is used by default.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.NeedTotalSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for paging. Tells BAQ to return total number of rows in result set when paging is enabled. If this setting is set to true then after the BAQ returned result dataset you need to look into ExecutionInfo table in this dataset and find the row with DynamicQueryConstants.TotalRows key.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.SQLDateFormatSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for transaction isolation. Is mapped to corresponding SQL setting. Allowed values can be taken from DynamicQueryConstants.TransactionIsolation enumeration. The default isolation level is ReadUncommited for ordinal queries and for external queries which configured with MS SQL client or have Prophet21 application type.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.TestExecutionTokenSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for GUID, set internally during query testing in BAQ designer to identify the query

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.RemoveTestRowLimitSettingName
member.summary: Setting name for RemoveTestRowLimit. Allows user to explicitly set unlimited row count from server during BAQ designer test execution

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.QueryTimeOut
member.summary: maximum query command timeout in seconds

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.QueryMaxResultSetTestHardCode
member.summary: default value of the queryMaxResultSet in test query mode

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.P21PrimaryUpdTable
member.summary: Name of the first table with Updatable columns. For P21 UBAQ customization only.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.P21ApiToken
member.summary: A token for indentification 21 user based on current ICE3 user.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.SystemCode
member.summary: System code used in reference to Ubaq methods in BPM customization.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ProductCode
member.summary: System code used as part of to Ubaq method name in BPM customization.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CurrentUserIDParamName
member.summary: Name of predefined BAQ parameter with current user ID.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CurrentCompanyIDParamName
member.summary: Name of predefined BAQ parameter with current company ID.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ErrorTypeInfo
member.summary: Name of informational error message in Errors table.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ErrorTypeWarning
member.summary: Name of warning message in Errors table.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.ErrorTypeError
member.summary: Name of error message in Errors table.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.RowModColName
member.summary: Name of column with RowMod value.

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.RowIDColName
member.summary: Name of column with row id value.

member.name: M:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.GetUbaqGetListMethodCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's GetList method name

member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's Update method name

member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's GetNew method name

member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's FieldUpdate method name

member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's FieldValidate method name

member.name: M:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.GetUbaqRunCustomActionMethodCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns full qualified UBaq's RunCustomAction method name

member.name: T:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.SqlServerDateFormat
member.summary: Select DataFormat for query mdy. dmy, ymd

member.name: T:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CriteriaType
member.summary: Type of the criteria stored in the QUeryWhereItem

member.name: F:Ice.Contracts.DynamicQueryConstants.CriteriaType.Join
member.summary: Criteria shown in JOIN Clause (or Where, if no Join defined)

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.QueryCtrlRow.ControlType
member.summary: One of predefined constants: Standard ? free type editor/date picker, depend on DataType. RadioSet ? radio button set. Items are specified in QueryCtrlValues table DropDown ? dropdown list. Items are specified in QueryCtrlValues table DropDownBAQ ? dropdown list. Information are stored in QueryCtrlValues table with tree rows with Ids:BAQID, BAQDisplayColumn, BAQValueColumn DropDownUserCodes - dropdown list. Information are stored in QueryCtrlValues table with one row with Id = UserCodeTypeID

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.QueryCtrlRow.SourceType
member.summary: Type of the datasource 0 - updatable field, 1 - parameter

member.summary: Unique identifier for this row. The value is a GUID.
